scripts.test:unit: npx jest --runInBand --coverage --coverageDirectory=coverage/coverage_unit --colors auth.unit.test.js controller.unit.test.js users.unit.test.js utils.unit.test.js
scripts.test:integration: npx jest --runInBand --coverage --coverageDirectory=coverage/coverage_integration --colors auth.integration.test.js controller.integration.test.js users.integration.test.js utils.integration.test.js
